about_the_game:
In that era of epidemic, I, who lived alone, could not escape and collapsed alone in the apartment. In a trance, I suddenly found myself in a black and white world, where there were people who gathered here for different reasons, a mysterious girl, and a group of mysteries and demons beyond cognition.

"Work together or kill each other"

The girl gives us hope to return to the human world, but also brings us harsh and frightening conditions. Should we follow our instincts and continue to maintain the kindness of the human world, or do everything for the illusory hope? In this ambiguous "City God's Residence", what is right? What is evil? Everything here has turned into chaos.

"Resurrection" is a suspenseful text adventure game. Players search for the truth of human heart hidden in the puzzles in an alternative Chinese-style fantasy dream woven by Chinese mysticism, religion, and folklore.The gameplay functions of the game are mainly divided into several parts: level options, plot reasoning, level decryption, and map exploration.

The game's option mechanism, except for a few that will trigger the death ending, has no penalty mechanism. Players can get better game freedom in the game and make choices based on their own likes and dislikes.

In order to allow players to better experience the plot and increase the sense of game substitution, the game's reasoning system has set up a function to extract important plot and scene information into a column. Players can use this function to organize plot clues, sort out the story context, find and restore the truth of the event.

The game's decryption level. In some plots and maps, there are hidden decryption levels. By challenging these level systems, you can get hidden props to unlock new hidden levels or plots.

The game's map exploration, the game has set up a certain degree of freedom to explore the map system. By exploring different scene systems, you can trigger new character or NPC dialogues, hidden levels, and branch plots attached to characteristic scenes.
